pr_title: Issue 5155: (SegmentStore) Enabling copy-on-read for all Segment Reads

timeline.message:
Enabling copy-on-read for all Segment Reads.

Signed-off-by: Andrei Paduroiu <andrei.paduroiu@emc.com>

timeline.bodyText: probably you can drop expectedCopyOnReadCount variable
timeline.author: eolivelli

replies.bodyText: Thanks @eolivelli, we couldn't address this comment as we received instructions to cut the 0.8 RC branch in the next hours (the PR author is not likely to be able to address that within this time frame). We will address your comment anyway in 0.9, if this works for you.
replies.author: RaulGracia

replies.bodyText:
@RaulGracia
Good for me. it is not a big deal to leave or drop such useless variable.
It is also weird that spotbugs did not catch the dead local store.
I thought we were running spotbugs even against tests.
replies.author: eolivelli
